attributes.review: The app glitches and has multiple issues regarding the ability to reserve slots to events. This app is another way for people of a certain criteria (racist, white privileged, economically driven to the point of pushing aside human lives [CORONA] etc.) to ban together and feel as though they are supporting a cause for everyone, when really it ONLY benefits them. Now, I understand if some have Republican values and are just wanting a Republican in office... oh wait... I DONT UNDERSTAND.

attributes.review: I wanted to download it to keep up but then it asked for my location and i didnâ€™t think much of it until i started hearing weird noises in my room at night. The next morning i woke up to an orange stain the shape of the cheeto man himself on my carpet with white goop everywhere. There were oranges and cheetos all over my floor and house. attributes.review:
The title is pretty self explanatory but Iâ€™ll make it obvious to Republicans (well the ones that can read)

#JUSTICE4TURTLES 
#CASTRATE #THE #CHEETO

So i downloaded the app because I have a turtle and he doesnâ€™t seem like himself. I mean Mercury is in retrograde so I felt like he might have just reverted back to old patterns. But I was nervous so I called my turtle guru. He came in and realized that Gary (my turtle) had unresolved TRAUMA IN HIS TAILBONE. So I decided to get to the bottom of it. Even though Gary is an exceptional turtle he does not have the ability to talk. He does however have an active life on the internet. So naturally, I checked his activity on his little tablet and he had downloaded this app. From there this Donald character had asked my 1 year old turtle to meet up. WHERE MY UNDERAGE TURTLE WAS TAKEN ADVANTAGE OF BY THIS GIANT CHEETO (he had written a very head breaking poem about the experience) Now I have to consider EUTHANASIA as alternative to the fate that most would argue is worse than death.
attributes.title: FAKE fake FAKE News
